definition: the owners of a private enterprise/management/capital (as opposed to labor)

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Management are seeking a show-down with the unions on the issue of illegal strikes.
sentences.chinese: 資方正在就非法罷工問題與工會攤牌。

sentences.english: It actually has a much greater chance of fulfilling our stakeholder's needs.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，它還大大增加了滿足出資方需要的機會。

sentences.english: Thailand now also tops the list of Laos’ foreign investors.
sentences.chinese: 泰國現在也是老撾最大的外資投資方之一。

sentences.english: The unions bargained with management for a shorter working week.
sentences.chinese: 工會爲縮短工作周而與資方討價還價。

sentences.english: Sometimes the very act of hiking wages makes workers more productive.
sentences.chinese: 有時，資方提高工資能使工人更有生產效率。

sentences.english: Management and union rank and filer alike hoped congress would act quickly.
sentences.chinese: 資方與工會會員都希望國會迅速採取行動。

sentences.english: Management compensated us for the time we worked.
sentences.chinese: 資方補償我們工作時間的報酬。

sentences.english: He was able to persuade capital to adopt his plans.
sentences.chinese: 他能說服資方採納他的計劃。

sentences.english: The strike resulted in the management's accepting the workers' demands.
sentences.chinese: 歇工的成果，資方接受了工人的要求。

sentences.english: The management is/are having talks with the workers.
Labor hinted it would like to resume the broken dialogue with the management.
sentences.chinese: 勞方暗示願意與資方恢復已中斷的對話。

sentences.english: The new code of conduct lays down the ground rules for management-union relations.
sentences.chinese: 新的行爲規範確定了資方與工會關係的基本原則。

sentences.english: The capitalists resisted all efforts to organize.
sentences.chinese: 資方想盡一切辦法阻止成立工會。

sentences.english: The above item 8 is applicable to state-owned enterprises only;
sentences.chinese: 第8項僅適用於國有企業投資方。

sentences.english: When the bosses send their lackeys out to cheat us?
sentences.chinese: 當資方派出走狗欺騙我們的時候？

sentences.english: The employers have not broken the dockers' strike.
sentences.chinese: 資方未能使碼頭工人結束罷工。

definition: labor (as opposed to capital or management)/the workers
Straits Exchange Foundation (SEF), semi-official organization established by the ROC government in Taiwan
Carrie Lam (1957-), chief executive of Hong Kong 2017-, full name 林鄭月娥|林郑月娥[Lin2 Zheng4 Yue4 e2] Carrie Lam Cheng Yuet-ngor
the state of play in an election/the current state of a candidate's campaign
within the party (esp. Chinese communist party)
to hold accountable/to blame/to censure/to apportion blame
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
